title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' after opening the file with a different type of editor, nothing happens. Instead, the previously opened editor is reactivated.
EB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' after opening the file with a different type of editor, a new editor should be opened on the file, considering the different editor type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. Choose the 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' option for test.xml in the Navigator.
4. Verify that the file opens in the scripted resource editor example.
5. Once again, select test.xml in the Navigator.
6. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
7. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example remains active.
